title: Slave trade Europe vs from Americas graph  Q2

content.question: The overall trend in the number of voyages during the period circa 1650â€“1750 was most directly caused by the

choices.label: beginnings of coffee cultivation in French and Dutch South American colonies
establishment of plantation sugar production in the Caribbean and in Brazil
decline of Native American populations due to infectious disease
increased use of enslaved Africans as silver mine laborers in Spanish America

content.answer: establishment of plantation sugar production in the Caribbean and in Brazil

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
